executable.title: Fiber Endpoint From Label Map
executable.description: Fiber Endpoint From Label Map allows a user to calculate the perentage of fibers whose endpoints touching certain regions in a label map. The labelmap is provided by users, which can be generated from, e.g., Freesurfer.

directory.name: InputDirectory
directory.label: Fibers File Folder
directory.description: Directory from which to read fibers
